title: Dissconnections in the main screen
body:
In the main screen or anywhere that is not in game my Client will disconnect. Now while I'm supposedly 'disconnected' i can still talk to friends and see when friends come online and I don't disconnect in game. I have repaired my client so many times it's not funny I also tried uninstalling League of legends a few times and then reinstalling but the problem still exists.

Please Riot  help me I've done so many things and now since I'm supposedly dodging games in Que but both connections are fine I'm really annoyed and upset. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
